thread.title: The 6 Beauty Products Rasika Navare Swears By
thread.title_full: The 6 Beauty Products Rasika Navare Swears By

title: The 6 Beauty Products Rasika Navare Swears By

persons.name: evan healy rose vetiver day moisturizer

text: Beauty Products The 6 Beauty Products Rasika Navare Swears By "I'd like to start by saying you must let your skin breathe by staying out of makeup whenever you can," the Indian model told us. "Get a great night's sleep, eat well and stay hydrated." After those standards are met, these six scores do the rest. February 21, 2017 Neal's Yard Remedies Purifying Palmarosa Facial Wash "My current beauty routine consists of chugging down a bottle of water as soon as I wake up, followed by this face wash," says Navare. The low-foaming blend gently whisks away impurities with an impressive roster of no-nonsense botanicals from marigold and nettle leaf extract to expressed lemon peel. £16.00 ( nealsyardremedies.com ). Evan Healy Rose Vetiver Day Moisturizer "I got to know about Evan Healy chatting up a fellow shopper at Whole Foods in New York City. My skin fell in love with the products," she says, noting she uses this luxe floral hydrator—after water, rose geranium hydrosol is the first ingredient—daily. $40.95 ( evanhealy.com ). La Roche Posay Anthelios XL SPF 50+ Navare never skips sunscreen—never, not ever. Her go-to is this fragrance-free, mineral-based non-irritating fluid. Stateside,
